Question: During her premiership this person had the second-lowest average approval rating, at 40 percent, of any post-war Prime Minister.
Hints: During the campaigns, she was supported by her parents and by Denis ****, whom she married in December 1951.
This person became a Privy Councillor (PC) upon becoming Secretary of State for Education and Science in 1970.
This person had already begun to work on her presentation on the advice of Gordon Reece, a former television producer.
